skills.name: Oracle
skills.longDescription: Tracks sessions, learns from corrections, maintains institutional knowledge across sessions, and generates token-efficient context. Prevents context loss and wasted effort. Includes session handoff for smooth transitions.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
skills.performance_boost: Guardian: +31% suggestion acceptance | Wizard: +19% doc accuracy
features: Strategic context injection (KISS - load only what's needed)
Enhanced session handoff with context preservation

skills.name: Guardian
skills.description: Quality gates and session health monitoring
skills.longDescription: Automatic quality monitor that spawns focused Haiku agents for code review when degradation detected. Validates suggestions against Oracle knowledge. Learns from user feedback to adjust sensitivity. Tracks session health to prevent 'sessions going insane'.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
features: Auto-triggers on code volume (>50 lines), repeated errors (3+), file churn (5+ edits)
Read-only Haiku subagents (analysis only, no modifications)
Oracle validation (cross-checks suggestions against known patterns)
Learning from feedback (adjusts sensitivity based on acceptance rates)
Templates: security, performance, feature planning, session health

skills.name: Summoner
skills.longDescription: Coordinates multiple specialized agents for complex, multi-component tasks. Task decomposition with Mission Control Documents. Parallel execution, quality gates, minimal context passing.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
skills.performance_boost: +25% task completion success with Oracle patterns loaded
features: Mission Control Documents (MCD) as single source of truth
Parallel agent execution where dependencies allow
Minimal context passing to each agent

skills.name: Wizard
skills.longDescription: Intelligent documentation that stays accurate through research, fact-checking, and validation. Research-first approach using Oracle + code + conversation history. No-hallucination policy - only facts with references.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
skills.performance_boost: +19% doc accuracy with Oracle | +35% completeness with Summoner research
features: Spawns read-only research agents via Summoner

skills.name: Style Master
skills.longDescription: Expert in CSS, design systems, and frontend styling. Analyzes codebases, maintains style guides, suggests modern improvements. Accessibility compliance (WCAG AA/AAA). Framework expertise in Tailwind, CSS-in-JS, Sass.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
skills.performance_boost: +22% consistency when Oracle tracks style preferences
features: Codebase style analysis and design token extraction
Modern CSS techniques (container queries, custom properties, logical properties)

skills.name: Evaluator
skills.longDescription: Anonymous, opt-in telemetry and feedback collection for continuous improvement. GitHub-native feedback via issues and projects. Aggregate metrics only - no individual events shared. Drives the community feedback loop.
skills.author: ClaudeShack
features: No PII collection (anonymous session IDs, daily rotation)
Aggregate metrics only (no individual events shared)
Drives community feedback loop for continuous improvement
useCases: Enabling telemetry to help improve skills
